channel.title: Homes on Colin Alstad
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Colin Alstad

item.description: Hello! I am a masters student in the Mathematics Department at the College of Charleston, working under the supervision of Ben Cox. I am also a software engineer at PokitDok where I work on projects in machine learning, distributed cryptographic systems, formal verification, and everything in between. My current research focus is in the higher representation theory of finite groups, specifically the categorification of the representations of the dihedral and dicyclic groups.
